name: stackzero
description: core repository for minimal stack SPAs

scripts.start-local: FORKS=1 NODE_ENV=development PORT=3000 DB_LOCATION=./data/$npm_package_name.db node --watch --watch-path=./app --watch-path=./core ./core/server.js | npx pino-pretty -S
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=development DB_LOCATION=:memory: conc --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run test:unit-integration' 'npm run test:e2e'
scripts.postinstall: if [ "$SKIP_POSTINSTALL" != "true" ]; then yarn setup:git-hooks && yarn setup:git-merge-strategy; fi
